messages.content: Cambridge has a proud tradition of electing truly influential figures who lead the national debate, not just follow it.
I was proud to campaign alongside Julian Huppert and David Howarth. Both packed a serious punch on the national stage, as well as being highly respected constituency MPs.

messages.title: As your MP, I'll be a shining beacon for the progressive values we all hold dear.
messages.content: That means leading from the front and moving the debate forward, both in Parliament and across the country. On Brexit. On the climate emergency. On inequality.

leaflet.personalStatement: Their voice was always prominent. And I believe that Cambridge's next MP must match and surpass their ability to lead the way with bold, progressive ideas.

contactInformation.address: Cambridge Liberal Democrats, 16 Signet Court, Swanns Road, Cambridge CB5 8LA

images.caption: Rod Cantrill, Liberal Democrat candidate for Cambridge

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS: We need a return to the days when Cambridge’s voice packed a punch well beyond our city’s border. As your MP, I will lead the national debate, not just follow it.
